title: Doctor Faustus - Christopher Marlowe  (1957)
description:
Audio Books : Literary : Other quality : English

The 1957 Caedmon recording of an abridged version of Christopher Marlowe's "The Tragical History of the Life and Death of Doctor Faustus," transferred by me to digital from a library copy of the original vinyl.



Cast:

Julian Barry, Frank Silvera, Terence Kilburn, Thayer David, Frederick Rolf, Chester Stratton, Darren McGavin, Sybil Baker, Richard Farmer, Richard Purdy, Stefan Gierasch, Mae Questell, Allen Stevenson, John Heldebrand, Cavada Humphrey, Frederick Worlock, John Pavelko

Directed by Howard O. Sackler
Caedmon TC 1033

Also included in the folder is the more complete 1956 BBC production, which was previously uploaded to Demonoid in a torrent containing several other Marlowe plays. Be advised that the first minute or so of the broadcast is missing.

Cast:

Baliol Holloway, Stephen Murray, Bryan Kendrick, Dorothy Gordon, Joan Hart, Denis McCarthy, Leigh Crutchley, Patrick Godfrey, Simon Lack, Esme Percy, Frank Partington, Charles Hodgson, Allan McClelland, James Thomason, John Wood, Kathleen Helme, Eric Francis, Morris Sweden, Patsy Byrne, Denis Goacher, William Fox, Martin Lewis

Producer: Michael Bakewell



Enjoy and Seed!!
